news.title: Anthropic and OpenAI CEOs condemn ICE violence, praise Trump
news.summary: Anthropic's Dario Amodei and OpenAI's Sam Altman spoke out against ICE enforcement tactics following Minneapolis violence, with one addressing concerns publicly and the other in an internal message.

news.title: Google’s more affordable AI Plus plan rolls out to all markets, including the U.S.
news.summary: Gemini 3 Pro and other AI tools are now available globally through the Google AI Plus plan, which is $7.99 per month in the United States.

news.title: OpenAI launches Prism, a new AI workspace for scientists
news.summary: OpenAI has launched a new scientific workspace program called Prism, which integrates AI into existing standards for composing research papers.

news.title: Amid Trump attacks and weaponized sanctions, Europeans look to rely less on US tech
news.summary: European governments are looking to move away from U.S. tech and reclaim their digital sovereignty at a time of unpredictability and volatility in the United States.

news.title: Anker’s foldable 3-in-1 charging station has hit a new low price of $50
news.summary: Buying separate chargers for your phone, watch, and earbuds adds up quickly. Anker’s MagGo Wireless Charging Station (Foldable 3-in-1) replaces all three, and now through January 30th it’s just $49.99 ($60 off) at Amazon-owned Woot. news.title: WhatsApp’s new ‘lockdown’ settings add another layer of protection against cyberattacks
news.summary: WhatsApp is launching new "Strict Account Settings" that add even more protections against cyberattacks. news.title: TikTok US is mostly back up and running

news.title: Google Search now lets you ask AI Overviews follow-up questions
news.summary: Google is making Search less about links and more about AI.
